Package com.c1games.terminal.algo.io

Interface GameLoop

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StarterAlgo
    public interface GameLoop
    An interface for a simple, single-threaded game loop, which the user can implement and then plug into a game loop driver to create a working algo.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void initialize​(GameIO io, Config config)
      Callback for receiving the config data at the beginning of the game.
      void makeMove​(GameIO io, MoveBuilder move)
      Callback for configuring a movebuilder each action frame, which the game loop driver will then submit as a turn.
      default void onActionFrame​(GameIO io, MoveBuilder move)
      Callback for processing an action frame data received between deploy phases.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        default void initialize​(GameIO io,
                        Config config)
        Callback for receiving the config data at the beginning of the game. Not all algos will have a reason to process this.

      • onActionFrame

        default void onActionFrame​(GameIO io,
                           MoveBuilder move)
        Callback for processing an action frame data received between deploy phases. Not all algos will have a reason to process this. This move builder is only used for random access to the map, and will not actually be submitted.

      • makeMove

        void makeMove​(GameIO io,
              MoveBuilder move)
        Callback for configuring a movebuilder each action frame, which the game loop driver will then submit as a turn.
